message:
Implement per-session state storage and improve daily reset logic

Major changes:
- Add selectedState and createdAt fields to EditorState interface
- Store emotional state per session (not just globally)
- StateChooser now displays session-specific date and state when viewing old notes
- Daily reset: only load most recent session if it's from today
- Timeline vertical layout: add bottom padding to prevent card cutoff
- Daily picture prompt: make it warmer and more minimal

Technical details:
- EditorEngine: Added optional selectedState and createdAt to EditorState
- App.tsx: Initialize createdAt on new session, save state to both EditorState and global
- App.tsx: Daily reset now checks if most recent session is from today before loading
- StateChooser: Accept and display createdAt prop for historical date display
- handleLoadEntry: Sync global selectedState when loading old sessions
- Backward compatible: old sessions without fields fallback to today's date
